name: ULTRA MODERN MUSIC MACHINEE
description:
ULTRA MODERN MUSIC MACHINEE

The music machine is broken. 

Help our engineers fix this situation by dragging and dropping parts back onto the machine with your mouse to make music happen.

Some parts don't work well with each other and will make each other hide. If you fix the machine with all parts the vortex is waiting those engineers who make the perfect machine.
